questions.question: Why do you want to be part of YC?
Why is your product priced the way it is?
questions.answer: 1 We look at our margin goals and what we think the market will bear based on competitor pricing

questions.question: If your startup succeeds, what additional areas could you expand into?
questions.answer: 2 All women's apparel that requires breast support and shapewear

questions.question: What's the biggest mistake you have made?
questions.answer: Thinking that other people were motivated by the same things I was and thought like I do.  To be persuasive, you must work to understand how other people are motivated and adapt your message accordingly.

questions.question: What will be your biggest challenge two years from now?
questions.answer: Successfully scaling the business and keeping ahead of fast followers with new innovations

questions.question: Who are your competitors?
What makes your product different from existing options?
Who would you hire, or how would you add to your team?
questions.answer: We want people who share our why - we want to make a meaninful difference in the world.  We will hire for mindset an attitude over skills.  Skills can be learned.  Mindset is harder to change

questions.question: How are you working to expand geographically?
What do you understand about your customers?
How will you make money?
Why isn't someone already doing this?
What do you know about this space/product others don't know?
What is the next step with the product evolution?
How do you know customers need what you're making?
Who would be your next hire?
questions.answer: Someone who is excited to share our product with the world (marketing) and is willing to think outside the box

questions.question: How long can you go before funding?
Someone just showed us an idea like this right before you guys. I don't like it. What else do you have?
Will you incorporate as a US company?
How will you get users?
questions.answer: By perfecting the product we will generate positive word-of-mouth.  Most women who try our product will tell their friends how comfortable and easy-to-wear our clothes and intimates are.  We think we can leverage satisfied customers plus social media to get the word out

questions.question: Will your team stick at this?
Have you raised funding?
What is your burn rate?
How do you know people want this?
What's the funniest thing that has happened to you?
Where will you locate?
Tell us something surprising you have done?
How are you meeting customers?
What obstacles will you face and how will you overcome them?
What else have you created together?
questions.answer: Laura and I collaborated when I build the BOM web application at Nike.  She was my go-to person for ideas, feedback, and testing

questions.question: How will customers and/or users find out about you?
What's new about what you make?
Who would use your product?
Who needs what you're making?
What products are you going to build first?
Why will you succeed?
questions.answer: 35 We will succeed because customers want better breast support, we have a good team, and we are willing to listen and learn

questions.question: What is your user growth rate?
questions.answer: We don't know yet.  We hope our products will have strong word-of-mouth, with each customer strongly recommending to several of her friends.  That is, our intention is to generate viral growth via exceptional customer satisfaction

questions.question: Who is the boss?
questions.answer: The buck stops with Laura.  This company is a manifestation of her vision.  That said, we are a small group with high trust.  Many decisions will be delegated.  As we grow, we will develop a decisioin-making framework so that Laura can delegate as much decision-making as possible and focus on vision, culture, and product

questions.question: What systems have you hacked?
What domain expertise do you have?
What are the key things about your field that outsiders don't understand?
What is your supply chain strategy?
What is your backup plan if your supply chain has disruptions?
How will you manage 3PL?
